pullRequest.title: CMake: cleanup cache files
pullRequest.bodyText:
Alphabetize entries
Remove unnecessary entries (setting cache variables to OFF)
Add OMR_GC_CONCURRENT_SCAVENGER to zlinux,plinux, xlinux, and windows
Enable J9VM_OPT_NATIVE_CHARACTER_CONVERTER on windows

Fixes #8667
Signed-off-by: Devin Nakamura devinn@ca.ibm.com

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -29,13 +29,12 @@ set(J9VM_ENV_SHARED_LIBS_CALLEE_GLOBAL_TABLE_SETUP ON CACHE BOOL "")
 set(J9VM_ENV_SHARED_LIBS_USE_GLOBAL_TABLE ON CACHE BOOL "")
 set(J9VM_ENV_USE_GCC ON CACHE BOOL "")
 
-set(J9VM_JIT_RUNTIME_INSTRUMENTATION ON CACHE BOOL "")
-set(J9VM_PORT_RUNTIME_INSTRUMENTATION ON CACHE BOOL "")
-set(J9VM_MODULE_CODEGEN_PPC ON CACHE BOOL "")
-set(J9VM_MODULE_THRTRACE ON CACHE BOOL "")
 set(J9VM_INTERP_ATOMIC_FREE_JNI ON CACHE BOOL "")
 set(J9VM_INTERP_ATOMIC_FREE_JNI_USES_FLUSH ON CACHE BOOL "")
 set(J9VM_INTERP_TWO_PASS_EXCLUSIVE ON CACHE BOOL "")
+set(J9VM_JIT_RUNTIME_INSTRUMENTATION ON CACHE BOOL "")
+set(J9VM_MODULE_CODEGEN_PPC ON CACHE BOOL "")
+set(J9VM_MODULE_THRTRACE ON CACHE BOOL "")

beforeCommit.message:
CMake: cleanup cache files

- Alphabetize entries
- Remove uncissary entries (setting cache variables to OFF)
- Enable Idle heap manager for plinux
- Add OMR_GC_CONCURRENT_SCAVENGER to zlinux,plinux, xlinux, and windows
- Enable J9VM_OPT_NATIVE_CHARACTER_CONVERTER on windows
- Enable OMR_GC_TLH_PREFETCH_FTA on windows

Fixes #8667

Signed-off-by: Devin Nakamura <devinn@ca.ibm.com>
